00001 #ifndef FASTDECODER_HH
00002 #define FASTDECODER_HH

00004 #include <string>
00005 #include "CaliceException.hh"
00006 #include <iostream>

00008 namespace CALICE {
00009 
00028   class FastDecoder {
00029 
00030   public:
00036     static FastDecoder* generateDecoder(const std::string& encodingString, const std::string& variableName);
00037 
00043     int decode(const int input) const {
00044       if (! _isSigned) throw WrongDataFormatException(std::string("cannot decode unsigned value as signed\n"));
00045       return  ((input >> _position) & _mask) - _offset;
00046     }
00047 
00053     unsigned int decodeU(const int input) const {
00054       if (_isSigned)  throw WrongDataFormatException(std::string("cannot decode signed value as unsigned\n"));
00055       return  ((input >> _position) & _mask) - _offset;
00056     }
00057 
00063     int encode(const int value) const {
00064       if (! _isSigned) throw WrongDataFormatException(std::string("cannot encode unsigned value as signed\n"));
00065       return (((value + _offset) & _mask ) << _position);
00066     }
00067 
00073     int encodeU(const unsigned int value) const {
00074       if (_isSigned) throw WrongDataFormatException(std::string("cannot encode signed value as unsigned\n"));
00075       return (((value + _offset) & _mask ) << _position);
00076     }
00077 
00078   private:
00079     FastDecoder(const unsigned int position, const unsigned int mask, const bool isSigned, const int offset) {
00080       _position = position;
00081       _mask = mask;
00082       _isSigned = isSigned;
00083       _offset = offset;
00084     }
00085 
00086     unsigned int _position;
00087     unsigned int _mask;
00088     bool _isSigned;
00089     int _offset;
00090   };
00091 
00092 } //namspace CALICE
